name: 30-Min Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion Futures
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy trading the three most liquid US equity index futures (ES, NQ, YM) on 30-minute bars. Uses a Bollinger Band (20,2) and RSI(14) confluence: buy when price closes below lower band and RSI<32; sell (short) when price closes above upper band and RSI>68. Positions are exited when price closes back inside the band channel or RSI returns to neutral (44-56). Protective OCO orders are placed immediately: 0.8 % stop-loss and 1.5 % take-profit relative to entry. Position size is calculated so the stop-loss risks exactly 1 % of account equity. Continuous futures series are built with a liquidity-based roll method.
